_sText:
Entropy:A measure of the disorder or randomness in a closed system.

The map's theme is to progress in chaotic textures / surfing as you progress through the levels, causing more distress.

Changes from entropy:

Level one is completely open ended (I've beaten it five different ways as of today).
Level two has been redone almost totally.
Level three has a longer ramp and less beams to avoid.
Level four has a larger hole to surf through at the beginning.
Level five was turned into a nice bhop air strafe and made considerably easier.

Jail:
Time expire jail is a minigame.
Winner jail is a kill button
Secret winner jail (requires two buttons) activates 5 buttons for fun
